git_message: Enforce JSON schema as single source of truth for ESG rubric

nondeterministic_time.description: datetime.now() and time.time() calls without override mechanism

unseeded_random.description: random.* or numpy.random.* without explicit seed control

silent_exception.description: try/except blocks without logging or re-raise

eval_exec.description: eval() or exec() usage - security and determinism risk

json_as_parquet.description: to_json() used where to_parquet() expected for artifacts

nondeterministic_ordering.description: Unordered dict iteration in scoring/retrieval code

network_imports.description: Network libraries in production code (exemptions: ingestion, api)

notes: Baseline represents pre-remediation state of production codebase
FATAL violations block audit (34 total) - primarily eval/exec in script/utils
WARN violations (169 total) - primarily non-deterministic time calls and silent exceptions
Next action: Apply remediation for FATAL violations, then re-audit

scope.files_scanned: All .py files excluding venv and caches
